SELECT B.*, M.MNAME, TO_CHAR(B.REGDATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG, (SELECT COUNT(*)AS CNT FROM REPLY R WHERE R.BNO= B.BNO) CNT FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M
